thread.title: Russia's Putin, France's Macron discuss Iran deal by phone - Kremlin

title: Russia's Putin, France's Macron discuss Iran deal by phone - Kremlin
text:
May 15, 2018 / 8:26 AM / a minute ago Russia's Putin, France's Macron discuss Iran deal by phone - Kremlin Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
MOSCOW (Reuters) - Russian President Vladimir Putin discussed the Iran nuclear deal and the situation in Syria with French President Emmanuel Macron by phone on Tuesday, the Kremlin said. FILE PHOTO: French President Emmanuel Macron (L) and Russian President Vladimir Putin (R) attend a bilateral meeting on the second day of the G20 summit in Hamburg, Germany, July 8, 2017. REUTERS/Ian Langsdon/POOL
The two presidents confirmed their commitment to the 2015 nuclear deal with Iran in the phone call, the Kremlin press service said in a statement. Macron is set to visit Russia to attend an economic forum next week. Reporting by Katya Golubkova; Editing by Alison Williams
